Related Character(s): 䌌
Связанный символ (и): 䌌

緁字的基本解释

緁
jī
古同“缉”，缝衣边：“緁以偏诸。”
衣边。

緁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiè］
［《廣韻》七接切，入葉，清。］
(1)同“緝”。缝衣边。
(2)见“緁獵”。

緁字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緁； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页928第19
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?七接切，音妾。【說文】緶衣也。或从習作䌌。【玉篇】縫也。亦作緝。【廣韻】連緁。【前漢·賈誼傳】白縠之表，薄紈之裏，緁以偏諸。【註】師古曰：緁，謂以偏諸緶著之也。　又【前漢·揚雄傳】鴻絧緁獵。【註】緁獵，相差次也。　又【集韻】七入切，音葺。疾葉切，音捷。義?同。

考證：〔【前漢·賈誼傳】白縠之衣，薄紈之裏，緁以偏諸。〕　謹照原文衣改表。
緁字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
緁字的起名意思

古同“缉”，指缝衣边，也有衣边之义。

緁
Basic explanation of words
緁
jī
Gu Tong "Ji", sewing the edge of his clothes: "Sai Yi Pianzhu."
Hem.
緁
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiè］
["Guangyun" seven consecutive cuts, into the leaves, Qing. ]
(1) Same as "Ji". Sewing the edges.
(2) See "Hunting".

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Seven cuts, sound concubine. [Said the text] Linyi also. Or from the study. [Jade articles] Sewing also. Also wanted. [Guang Yun] Lian Hao. [Previous Han·Jia Yi's Biography] The table of white 縠, the lining of thin 纨, are all different. [Note] Shi Gu said: "Zhou," that is, it is said that it is based on the partiality.　[Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Hung Yau Hunting. [Note] There is a difference between hunting and hunting.　[Jiyun] Seven cuts, sound 葺. Quick leaves cut, sound Czechoslovakia. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Previous Han·Jia Yi Biography] Baiyu's clothes, thin-swallow's lining, and so on. 〕　I would like to change the table according to the original clothes.

緁
Name meaning
In ancient times, "Ji" refers to sewing the edge of the garment, and it also means the edge of the garment.
qī, qiē
гл. вм. 缉 qī (прошивать строчкой, строчить по кромке)
